title: Hard Whispers
description: When protagonist Pamela Graham is told about a dark government plot she is tossed into a fast paced world where time is running out as fast as the people that are dying around her. She has to expose what she knows before it is too late for her and an oblivious mass of victims.Hard Whispers is the first release novel of this thought provoking thriller series that grips the imagination and dances on the edge of reality. Hard Whispers captures the reader by introducing a well designed story line mixed with intriguing characters.
author: Pamela  Martin
